Basic.name: Ambush
Basic.description: Exploit surprise for frightful or violent ends.

Basic.name: Authority
Basic.description: Let your position of power do the talking.

Basic.name: Assess
Basic.description: Think before acting. Catalog the possible advantages and consequences of a course of action.

Basic.name: Backsnap
Basic.description: Overwhelming aggression

Basic.name: Berate
Basic.description: Use your words to make someone feel small

Basic.name: Bleedout
Basic.description: Small, precise strikes in vital regions

Basic.name: Brace
Basic.description: Prepare for a sudden pain or shock.

Basic.name: Browse
Basic.description: Passively take note of a collection of things without paying attention to specifics.

Basic.name: Carry
Basic.description: Traverse your surroundings while under a heavy load.

Basic.name: Challenge
Basic.description: Confront someone in a way that demands a response.

Basic.name: Charge
Basic.description: Rush into danger without a plan.

Basic.name: Command
Basic.description: Wield authority to get things done

Basic.name: Disconnect
Basic.description: Fortify your mind against upsetting stimuli.

Basic.name: Interface
Basic.description: Work with tech the way it was intended to accomplish a task.

Basic.name: Frighten
Basic.description: Use fear as a blunt instrument.

Basic.name: Instinct
Basic.description: Make the right call when there's no time to think.

Basic.name: Encyclopedia [X]
Basic.description: Recall propagandized basic information about a topic.

Basic.name: Loyalty (Kingwulf)
Basic.description: Use your commitment to Kingwulf as a source of strength.

Basic.name: Manufacture
Basic.description: Create something from raw materials or components.

Basic.name: Navigate
Basic.description: Find your way through complex environments.

Basic.name: Netsurf
Basic.description: Use the net to find information or communicate with others.

Basic.name: Observe
Basic.description: Watch and learn. Gain insight into a person or situation.

Basic.name: Persevere
Basic.description: Endure pain or hardship to accomplish a task.

Basic.name: Persuade
Basic.description: Convince someone to do something without misleading them.

Basic.name: Prowl
Basic.description: Skirt the edges of danger or lurk in the shadows.

Basic.name: Pull
Basic.description: Move something heavy or difficult.

Basic.name: Resolve [X]
Basic.description: Find strength in your deep personal convictions.

Basic.name: Relate [X]
Basic.description: Establish a connection or understanding with someone.

Basic.name: Rummage
Basic.description: Search through refuse for something useful.

Basic.name: Stalk
Basic.description: Follow someone or something without being noticed.

Basic.name: Step
Basic.description: Move carefully through dangerous terrain.

Basic.name: Suggest
Basic.description: Plant an idea in someone's mind without them realizing it.

Basic.name: Survey
Basic.description: Watch vigilantly to notice details others might miss.

Basic.name: Throatgore
Basic.description: Pack tactics, go for the throat

Basic.name: Visual Calculus
Basic.description: Understand how physical things in the world will affect each other

Restricted.name: Acrobatics
Restricted.description: Traverse your surroundings with grace and speed.

Restricted.name: Analyze
Restricted.description: Examine something to understand its function or purpose.

Restricted.name: Brawl
Restricted.description: Engage in unstructured close combat.

Restricted.name: Candor
Restricted.description: Get someone to view you favorably or reveal a secret.

Restricted.name: Cobble
Restricted.description: Rapidly make an improvised tool or weapon from available tech.

Restricted.name: Consort
Restricted.description: Meet with others to gain information or favors.

Restricted.name: Coordinate
Restricted.description: Direct multiple unique entities to act as one.

Restricted.name: Crowdbreaking
Restricted.description: Maximize damage to groups of surrounding foes

Restricted.name: Debate
Restricted.description: Engage in a formal discussion to convince others of your point of view.

Restricted.name: Deal
Restricted.description: Negotiate a mutually beneficial agreement with someone.

Restricted.name: Drama
Restricted.description: Appeal to emotions to elicit a response.

Restricted.name: Eavesdrop
Restricted.description: Listen in on a conversation without being noticed.

Restricted.name: Flaunt
Restricted.description: Broadcast your skills and make a spectacle of using them.

Restricted.name: Fuel
Restricted.description: Inflame a fire or strong emotion.

Restricted.name: Galvanize
Restricted.description: Stoke positive energy; inspire confidence in yourself and others.

Restricted.name: Hide
Restricted.description: Conceal yourself or something else from view.

Restricted.name: Intercede
Restricted.description: Put yourself in harm's way to protect someone else.

Restricted.name: Lift
Restricted.description: Take something from someone without them noticing.

Restricted.name: Logic
Restricted.description: Analyze something to understand where its axioms lead

Restricted.name: Lurk
Restricted.description: Remain unnoticed while observing your surroundings.

Restricted.name: Manipulate
Restricted.description: Deceive or coerce someone into doing what you want.

Restricted.name: Mirado
Restricted.description: Observe, then act.

Restricted.name: Obfuscate
Restricted.description: Hide your true intentions or confound someone's understanding.

Restricted.name: Organize
Restricted.description: Arrange meetings, get people on the same page, or create understanding from chaos.

Restricted.name: Pilot
Restricted.description: Operate a vehicle or machine with skill.

Restricted.name: Pretense
Restricted.description: Present a false front or disguise your true intentions.

Restricted.name: Read
Restricted.description: Understand the emotions of others

Restricted.name: Resolve [X]
Restricted.description: Find strength in your deep personal convictions.

Restricted.name: Sabotage
Restricted.description: Tamper with or damage a machine or device.

Restricted.name: Scheme
Restricted.description: Make a complicated plan to do something underhanded or immoral

Restricted.name: Smash
Restricted.description: Hurt someone or damage something with brute force.

Restricted.name: Smolder
Restricted.description: Handle social situations with a cool, charming demeanor.

Restricted.name: Spin
Restricted.description: Twist the truth or redirect conversation to your advantage.

Restricted.name: Squeeze
Restricted.description: Get into or out of a tight spot.

Restricted.name: Study
Restricted.description: Research a topic or item. Gain insight into its function or history.

Restricted.name: Tech [X]
Restricted.description: Use your knowledge of a specific technology to accomplish a task

Restricted.name: Tinker
Restricted.description: Work to understand or improve a machine or device

Forbidden.name: Bravado
Forbidden.description: Maintain confidence even in the face of overwhelming odds.

Forbidden.name: Comfort
Forbidden.description: Provide emotional support to someone in need

Forbidden.name: Connect
Forbidden.description: Open up to someone so that they reciprocate

Forbidden.name: Defy
Forbidden.description: Push back or lash out against a higher power or authority.

Forbidden.name: Diverge
Forbidden.description: Think outside of convention and embrace unexpected solutions.

Forbidden.name: Encourage
Forbidden.description: Aid someone to feel confident in their own strengths

Forbidden.name: Hack
Forbidden.description: Manipulate a system or device to gain unauthorized access or control.

Forbidden.name: History
Forbidden.description: Recall past events or knowledge to inform your actions.

Forbidden.name: Ignite
Forbidden.description: Incite action from an individual or group on the brink of conflict.

Forbidden.name: Impersonate
Forbidden.description: Pass yourself off as someone who you aren't.

Forbidden.name: Initiate
Forbidden.description: Start something dangerous or take the first step into the unknown

Forbidden.name: Loyalty
Forbidden.description: Use your commitment to something as a source of strength.

Forbidden.name: Rally
Forbidden.description: Inspire others to come together and act as one.

Forbidden.name: Relate
Forbidden.description: Establish a connection or understanding with someone.

Forbidden.name: Resolve
Forbidden.description: Find strength in your deep personal convictions.

Forbidden.name: Rhetoric
Forbidden.description: Persuade or manipulate others with the way your words make them feel
